To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private MatchingLow _matchinglow;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_matchinglow = MatchingLow(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_matchinglow.IsReady)
{
    var period = _matchinglow.Period.Value;
    var current = _matchinglow.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.matchinglow = self.MatchingLow(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.matchinglow.IsReady:
    period = self.matchinglow.Period.Value
    current = self.matchinglow.Current.Value
